name: HALDI KURTI
description: A Haldi Kurti for a marriage is a specially chosen yellow-themed, comfortable, and vibrant ethnic garment worn by the bride, groom, or guests during the pre-wedding Haldi ceremony. This attire is designed to be comfortable for the joyous, often messy, ritual of applying turmeric paste (Haldi/Pithi) to skin to ensure a radiant glow.
